'''Folco Boffin''' (born {{SR|1378}}) was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].<ref name="Boffin">{{App|Boffin}}</ref>

==History==
Folco was the son of [[Vigo Boffin]] and one of the guests at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref name="Boffin"/>

He was a friend of [[Frodo Baggins]],<ref>{{FR|Shadow}}, p. 42</ref> and in [[September]] {{TA|3018}} he stayed in [[Bag End]] assisting in Frodo's move to [[Buckland]] by packing and loading carts. He stayed to celebrate [[22 September|Frodo's birthday]] with [[Merry]], [[Pippin]] and [[Fatty Bolger]]. [[23 September|The next day]]<ref>{{App|Great}}, entry for the year 3018, September 23, p. 1091</ref> they loaded the last of the luggage leaving for [[Crickhollow]], and after lunch he left for his home.<ref>{{FR|Three}}, pp. 67-68</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''1995-8: ''[[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]]'':'''
:Folco Boffin is a Scout, playable as a Character.

'''2002: [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (video game)]]:'''
:Folco lives at Number Seven, Water Road, in [[Hobbiton]].
